content: Aaaah so that’s where Trump got the idea to peddle that unmitigated narishkeit: from David Duke, KKK grand wizard himself. Trump is a complete and absolute nightmare for Jews, as he is for every citizen of this Earth. How is the US congress idly standing by while this dangerous, disgusting, stupid liar trashes America and insults everyone from the US military to the leader of Australia? When will it stop?!
